title: Odds & Ends (Pick ups, props and Power ups collection)
description: More than 430 props, pickups & powerups variations.  More than 40 unique models.  Various colors and textures.  From common items to rare ones.  Cute items, weaponry, food and gems.  All you need is included.
longDescription:
Youtube Video | Discord | Twitter/X


This package contains 42 unique pick-up and power-up models with 434 texture and material variations.


The quality is high enough for PC games but is also usable on mobile. Some items are more detailed than others according to their needs.


All textures are 2048x2048


No matter if you are making an RPG, a survival game or one of those sandbox, games with building, crafting and simulation elements, We have some items for you. If you are themed fantasy, real, stylized, modern, anything really, we have some items for you.


If you are making a cute, wholesome game with interesting narrative branches or stories, we have some items for you. Do you want cozy models, battle gear, food? You name it, we have it!

technicalDetails:
Number of Unique Meshes: 42

Collision: Yes automatically generated

Vertex Count: The smallest is about 250 and the most detailed one is around 5000

LODs: No

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 5 Materials and over 350 Material Instances

Number of Textures: over 300

Texture Resolutions: 2048x2048

Documentation: This is a package of meshes. Use them as you use any other mesh and material in Unreal. The blueprints are just actors with a static mesh and a material assigned to them with no additional functionality.

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
